statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (2,-14) and (13,6).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{6}-{\left(-{14}\right)}}}{{{13}-{\left({2}\right)}}}=\frac{{20}}{{11}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{20}}{{11}} (if it's not already reduced)
